overview: When a decent young girl buys Magic rollerskates instead of a pair of shoes to wear for church, our 8th fairy tale can begin: Because who ever puts on the skates gets horny as hell! Karin becomes a slutty fuckmachine, tiny Rita discovers the joys of spanking, and juicy Sabina abuses her tight little ass with a dildo AND a rock hard dick! Nine fresh young models give in to their cravings with lesbian triosex, shaving dildo's, fistfucking... You name it: It is all in this film!
title: Once Upon a Time 8: The Skating Magician
